title: My website
meta_description: This is where I will tell my friends way too much about me
main_content: Sample blog post Each post also has a subtitle Posted on February 28, 2020 This is a demo post to show you how to write blog posts with markdown. I strongly encourage you to take 5 minutes to learn how to write in markdown - it’ll teach you how to transform regular text into bold/italics/headings/tables/etc. [Read More] Tags: test
